biography: Back in 2022 I started learning frontend at Platzi, on 2023 joined X Academy, where professionals who work at Santex teach Full Stack Development.
Currently, I'm building open source projects on Github with the community.
On my free time, you can find me reading history books or training taekwondo

items.title: Pictura
description: Pictura is a social network dedicated to image sharing and posting. It allows users to sign up, upload, edit, and delete image posts. Additionally, users can create image collections and set up a public profile.

items.title: Memoir
description: Memoir is a web-based text editor I developed to extend the capabilities of Obsidian, a native text editor application I use for writing my notes and reflections.

Memoir allows users to create, edit, and delete text documents online. It supports various text styles, including bold, strikethrough, and italics, as well as different text blocks like headings and paragraphs.

items.title: Interestellar
description: Interestellar is a focused task management tool designed specifically for development team collaboration.
Developed in collaboration with Jesus Oyola, with my focus on the frontend and Jesus on the backend, Interestelar facilitates efficient project management
Features include user sign-up, organization creation, member invitations, customizable Kanban board columns, task creation, task assignment to team members, and linking tasks to GitHub issues.
